oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Robertson Statement
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Greene, Colton; Civil War; military;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sworn statement of Capt. F. I. Robertson: Greene gave no orders counter-manding the requisition of mules and held no conversation encouraging others to to disobey the order; statement sworn before Br. Gen. John B. Clark, Jr.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Manuscript collection processed by John Jones
